headline: Juniper Square’s AI CRM Deal With eVestment Might Change The Case For Investing In Nasdaq (NDAQ)
summary: In January 2026, Juniper Square announced the next phase of its partnership with Nasdaq, embedding Nasdaq’s eVestment institutional investor intelligence platform directly into Juniper Square’s AI CRM for Investor Relations to give IR teams real-time access to more than 0.10 billion investor and consultant contacts across over 30,000 profiles without extra integration work. This integration underscores Nasdaq’s push deeper into financial technology by placing its data and analytics directly...
